metadata.Title: CVE-2018-2562 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server : Partition). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.58 andprior, 5.6.38 and prior and 5.7.19 and prior. Easily exploitablevulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access viamultiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of thisvulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang orfrequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server as well asunauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of MySQL Serveraccessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.1 (Integrity and Availabilityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-2562` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
